page.title: 06Living in a Portakabin(1)
page.content: A{portakabin}is a small cabin you live in when your council{house}is being{modernised.}They come on the back of a lorry and are put into your front garden by a crane. The electricity in the house is connected to the portakabin, as is the water. There are{two}rooms. There is a built in electric fire and in the kitchen there is a small cooker and a sink. A T.V. is provided but there is no bath or toilet, so you have to have a bath somewhere else and use the toilet in the house. Two people can sleep in the portakabin and the rest of the family must sleep in the house. Any furniture needed is taken from the house. It is{not comfortable,}but when the house is completed it all seems worthwhile.}
